decision_conditions: No food shall be sold from the three larger retail units except for an area or areas not exceeding in aggregate 265.5 square metres, or approximately 2650 square feet.  REASON: To accord with the terms of the submitted application and to ensure that the retail operation does not detract from the function of the Borough's established shopping centres, in accordance with policy 7.2 of the adopted Ealing Unitary development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | The areas shown on the approved plans as parking, access, loading, unloading and manoeuvring areas shall be kept clear and used for these purposes only, to the satisfaction of the local planning authority and shall not be used for any other purpose.  REASON: To ensure that adequate parking and servicing space is available within the site, in accordance with policy 9.1 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
description: Variation of Condition 8 of planning permission AC/HB/TPW 7218/25 (P/1984/0999) dated 12/4/1988  for the erection of a sports hall and retail units with loading, unloading and parking provision.
